scripts.d1:clean: wrangler d1 execute NEXT_CACHE_D1 --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS revalidations"
scripts.d1:setup: wrangler d1 execute NEXT_CACHE_D1 --command "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS revalidations (tag TEXT NOT NULL, revalidatedAt INTEGER NOT NULL, UNIQUE(tag) ON CONFLICT REPLACE);"
scripts.build:worker: pnpm d1:clean && pnpm opennextjs-cloudflare build && pnpm d1:setup
